channel.title: Commercial cleaning on Servi-tek : A Tribe of Innovation

item.title: Four Ways Technology Helps Improve Customer Service With Your Janitorial Business
item.description: In today’s highly competitive janitorial cleaning vertical, customer service isn’t just important - it’s everything. With countless commercial cleaning providers vying for market share, maintaining the integrity and quality of every customer interaction enhance professional partnerships, drives brand loyalty, and helps your enterprise edge out the competition. Technology Plays a Vital Role in Customer Service Satisfaction Integrating technology across your janitorial business can play a crucial role in your company’s customer service experience.
